name: Fantasy Island
description: This is a simple crossbar game, simple screen, simple operation. If you like simple game fun, try it out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
